name: Sorter
setup: Agent stands in a circular room with numbered tiles placed around it; each episode uses a random subset of values.
goal: Visit all tiles in ascending numeric order.

agents.description: Single agent moving continuously in the circular room.

terms: +1.0 for visiting the correct next tile in the sequence.

behavior_parameters.vector_observation_space: 4 floats for the agent's position and facing direction.
behavior_parameters.actions: 3 discrete branches for forward/backward, sideways movement, and rotation.

float_properties.name: num_tiles
float_properties.description: Maximum number of tiles present in the episode.
